definitions.definition: Often with up, to speed up the rate of doing something.
definitions.example: If you don't hurry (up) you won't finish on time.

definitions.definition: To cause to be done quickly.
To hasten; to impel to greater speed; to urge on.
To impel to precipitate or thoughtless action; to urge to confused or irregular activity.
To put: to convey coal in the mine, e.g. from the working to the tramway.
The act of one who hurries; hasty motion.
